text: <@U026E0ZNR>:  I swear I answered this from my phone yesterday but it looks like it never took. Sorry about that. It would be awesome to get @2x assets for this. Can you make them 1880px wide for the 2@x? Also, for photography let’s use jpg at 90% to make things load a bit faster. Let me know if you have any questions.

Hey Guys, sorry for my silence yesterday. The plan currently is for Gaston to make a ton of progress today and for us to launch and promote it tomorrow by mid day. Let me know if any questions/concerns come up.

Lots of great sessions and networking yesterday so didn’t make much progress. On the flip side, learned some new fancy SVG techniques directly applicable to this project and I’ll be working heads down on this all day.
sounds great abby - gaston, it’s looking really awesome
My memory of Beast Wars seemed way cooler before I was reminded of what it really looks like.
<@U02618EV1>: Here are the updated device photos saved as JPGs in both 1x and 2x: <https://www.dropbox.com/s/ojisq0yl981c674/Device%20Carousel%20JPGs.zip>
